member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ServiceModelContract.RawMessageFormatter.SerializeReply(System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion,System.Object[],System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes a reply message from a specified message version, array of parameters, and a return value.

member.name: T:Terrasoft.Core.ServiceModelContract.RawMessageFormatterAttribute
member.summary: WCF supports two body processing modes: first is using data contracts and second is reading raw body as Stream. Data contracts is not supported in services that has at least one method with parameter of type Stream. To support both modes, every method with parameter of type Stream should be marked with this attribute.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ServiceModelContract.RawMessageFormatterAttribute.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription)
member.summary: Implement to confirm that the operation meets some intended criteria.
member.param: The operation being examined. Use for examination only. If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ServiceModelContract.RawMessageFormatterAttribute.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation)
member.summary: Implements a modification or extension of the service across an operation.
member.param: The operation being examined. Use for examination only. If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.
The run-time object that exposes customization properties for the operation described by .

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ServiceModelContract.RawMessageFormatterAttribute.ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation)
member.summary: Implements a modification or extension of the client across an operation.
member.param: The operation being examined. Use for examination only. If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.
The run-time object that exposes customization properties for the operation described by .

member.summary: Implement to pass data at runtime to bindings to support custom behavior.
member.param: The operation being examined. Use for examination only. If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.
